0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
This News and News skill periodically examines details surrounding major events in the news. We explain why opposing viewpoints exist and help you understand the differences. 

Past topics have included deep dives into the history of impeachment, the Ukraine scandal, the impact of the college admissions scam, how the media and President Trump rely on each other, and the potential impact deepfake videos pose to our society. 

Select the News and News Daily Insights skill today and let us help you better understand what's behind the news.
